data.Summary:
Seasoned Senior Security Engineer with a distinguished 7-year track record specializing in Web Application Security, Vulnerability Management, Vendor Risk Management, and comprehensive Risk Assessment, Incident Response, Endpoint Security, Detection and Response and Penetration Testing. Proven expertise in developing and executing robust security strategies to fortify organizational defenses. Adept at fostering cross-functional collaboration, demonstrating excellent interpersonal skills to effectively engage with diverse teams and stakeholders. A results-oriented professional dedicated to achieving core business objectives through strategic security initiatives.

AREAS OF EXPERTISE:

Vulnerability management
Application Security Assessment & Audits
Mobile application security 
Threat Intelligence/Endpoint Protection
Incident detection response
Case Management
Endpoint Security 
Security Orchestration/Automation
Log Management
Identity Management and Access control
AWS, Azure
Security assessments based on ISO 27000 frameworks, NIST, CCPA, GDPR, CSA, SOX, SOC 1 & SOC 2 reports
Web app penetration testing
iOS/Android app penetration testing
Java/Python source code reviews
Incident Handling and Response
Vendor Risk Management
Performing PCI-DSS compliance assessments
Consulting application development teams on security issues, risks, and mitigation advice


Breathwrok/Meditation instructor volunteering with a non-profit to bring meditation, breathwork, emotional intelligence, social connection, and service leadership to college students, faculty and staff.

We envision happy and mindful campus communities where students, faculty, & staff thrive in life and lead with clarity of mind, resilience, purpose & belonging.

Currently working with the chapter at the University of Southern California.
